shortdesc.ph: Gets user information by User Account.
Gets user information by User Account.
Gets user information by User Account.
Gets user information by User Account.

p.codeblock: public abstract int GetUserInfoByUserAccount(string userAccount, ref UserInfo userInfo);

section.p: After a remote user joins a channel, the SDK obtains the UID and User Account of the remote user, then caches a mapping table of UID and User Account, and triggers the callback locally. After receiving the callback, call this method with the User Account to get the object that contains the UID of the specified user.

After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK obtains the UID and User Account of the remote user, then caches a mapping table containing the UID and User Account of the remote user, and triggers the callback locally. After receiving the callback, call this method and pass in the User Account to get the object containing the specified user's UID.

After a remote user joins a channel, the SDK retrieves the UID and User Account of the remote user and caches a mapping table of UID and User Account. It then triggers the callback locally. After receiving this callback, call this method with the User Account to get the object that contains the specified user's UID.

After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK retrieves the UID and User Account of the remote user, then caches a mapping table of UID and User Account, and triggers the callback locally. After receiving the callback, call this method with the User Account to get the object containing the specified user's UID.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method after receiving the callback.
Call this method after receiving the callback.
Call this method after receiving the callback.

plentry.pd:
Input and output parameter. The object identifying the user:
Input: A object.
Output: A object containing the user's User Account and UID.

ul.li: The object, if the method call succeeds.
The object, if the method call succeeds.
The object, if the method call succeeds.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
